feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
